articles.title: Woman Allowed To Make "Blood Money" Deal To Save Daughter On Death Row In Yemen - NDTV
articles.description: A Kerala nurse on death row in Yemen for murder will now be represented by her mother, who was granted permission by the Delhi High Court to travel to the West Asian country and negotiate her daughter's release.
articles.content:
Nimisha Priya was found guilty of killing a Yemeni national and has been in prison since 2018.
